action_result:
By scrolling up, the screen transitioned to the "All Apps" section, where all available apps are now visible. This action does not directly contribute to the user request of searching for Italian restaurants on Maps.

However, it does provide easier access to the Maps app, which is now visible in the "All apps" section. This allows the user to quickly tap on the Maps icon and proceed with the search for Italian restaurants. Therefore, while scrolling up is not directly related to searching for restaurants, it helps by enabling faster access to the Maps app, making progress toward completing the user request.
